description: Warning: Addictive! Bubbbles is a game which will keep you entertained for hours. Your goal is to match three or more bubbles to make them disappear. When you move a bubble, it doesn't stop until it collides, so you have to find clever ways to arrange the bubbles as you want. The more bubbles you match at once, the more points you get! Can you beat the (online) highscores? --- With update 1.1, there is a color blind mode. Update 1.2 introduces online highscores! New in 1.3: Tetris mode. With version 1.4, Bubbbles can be played on the Pixi. Update 1.5 introduces puzzle mode with 12 levels! Version 1.5.1 adds 4 more levels to puzzle mode.
